title: What is the Theme application?
info: application offers a collection of over 12,000 free themes and 15,000 high-quality wallpapers designed for Android smartphones. It allows users to personalize their devices, making them more visually appealing and tailored to individual tastes.

title: How can I use it?
info: application is simple and user-friendly. You can browse, select, and apply themes or wallpapers directly from the app to customize your device. For detailed instructions, please follow this link: [https://thethemes.co/use_app].

title: What is Lite Theme?
info: Lite Theme are lightweight themes designed to save system resources, ensuring smooth performance. They are compatible with all smartphones, making them an ideal choice for users who prefer simple and efficient customization.

title: I can't download themes because it says 'No internet connection.' What should I do?
info: This problem occurs on POCO, Xiaomi and Redmi devices when the selected theme is not available in your region or not compatible with your device, please try to select other themes. This problem does not depend on us. Thank you for your understanding!

title: I applied a theme, but my device icons didn't change. What should I do?
info: This issue occurs when you apply a Lite Theme. Lite Themes are lightweight themes designed to save system resources and do not include icon changes. To change your device icons, try applying a different theme.

title: Will it support to my device?
info: The application supports most themes for Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, Redmi, Oppo, POCO, and Realme devices. However, users with other devices can still enjoy Lite Themes and all high-quality wallpapers available in the app.

title: I looked for fonts, but there are no fonts available. What should I do?
info: Currently, fonts in the application are available only for Oppo and Realme devices. We are actively working on adding support for fonts on other devices in the future. Thank you for your patience!

title: What is the benefit of using this application if Themes already includes a theme store?
info: Our application is designed to provide you with over 12,000 free, high-quality themes and wallpapers, saving you the hassle of searching for free options in the Theme Store. We focus on making personalization easy and accessible for everyone. Thank you for your understanding!
